sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> hits a <radical>valley</radical>, filling it up with water. Lucky for you, you're a giant, so you just lay down in the valley and use it to <kanji>bathe</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Sure, there's a lot of water in the valley, but you're big too. It's the perfect place for you to bathe... and good thing too, you're getting smelly.
readingMnemonic: You know what would make the <kanji>bath</kanji>ing experience even better? If you had some egg <reading>yolk</reading>s (<ja>よく</ja>) to eat. Just crack those yolks into the water you bathe in, and it'll cook to perfection. Yum!
readingInfo: Imagine cooking egg yolks in the same water you bathe in.
